actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL (Time To Live) indexes at 50% progress, targeting documents like logs or sessions that expire after a set time to optimize storage and performance.
implementation_steps: Review current index setup in MongoDB schema files.
Add TTL indexes for expiring collections (e.g., db.collection.createIndex({ "createdAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 3600 }))
Test index creation and document expiration in dev environment.
Update package.json scripts for automated index verification.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Performance Monitoring to p50/p95 Tracking
actionable_tasks.description: Advance performance monitoring from 40% completion by adding p50 and p95 latency metrics tracking to meet Q1 2026 target of API response time <200ms.
implementation_steps: Integrate a metrics library like Prometheus or AppMetrics for percentile calculations.
Instrument key API endpoints to capture response times.
Expose p50/p95 metrics via a /metrics endpoint.
Add alerting if p95 exceeds 200ms.
